Name: Galactic Refugees
About the game: Galactic Refugees is a beginner-friendly old-school shmup meets bullet hell about escaping a fascist government, that offers real challenges at higher levels and difficulties. Features: Replays Cheats Procedural Generation Communist Propaganda Cloud Saving Achievements
